name: range_guidance_demo
description: Demo looseness-aware preflop range guidance with diverse looseness personalities
hypothesis: AI preflop prompts show range-relative language (premium/well within/edge/outside) that varies by personality looseness and position

personalities.name: Bob Ross
personalities.description: TIGHT: looseness=0.38, poise=0.85 - plays few hands, very stable

personalities.name: Sherlock Holmes
personalities.description: MEDIUM: looseness=0.58, poise=0.85 - standard range, analytical

personalities.name: Napoleon
personalities.description: LOOSE: looseness=0.79, ego=0.86 - wide range, aggressive

personalities.name: Blackbeard
personalities.description: VERY LOOSE: looseness=0.87 - widest range, plays almost anything
